name: Project Name
empty: You have not created any projects yet!

create_env.title: Create Blank Environment
create_env.private_desc: Set this environment as private. Other team members will not be able to view this version, except team members with Admin rights.
create_env.readonly_desc: Set this environment as private. Other team members will not be able to view this version, except team members with Admin rights.

name_desc: This is your project's visible name within the platform. For example, the name of your product, application or service.
edit_name_success: Project name has been successfully updated
avatar_desc: Click on the avatar to upload a custom one from your files. An avatar is optional but strongly recommended.
transfer_desc: The project owner is the person who has created the project or the person to whom the project ownership has been transferred. The owner has full control over the project and only project owners can delete the project or transfer its ownership to someone else.

invite.title: Invite Team Members to Project
invite.subTitle: Invite Project Members
invite.description: Each project member can have different role assigned to authorize certain actions within the project itself. When you invite a new member to your project Agnost will create a unique link that you can share with the user. The user will be able to join the project by clicking on the link. You can view and copy the generated link from the pending invitations section and also revoke the invitation at any time.
invite.deleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this invitation? This action cannot be undone. The user will not be able to join the project.

delete.title: Delete Project
delete.alert: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
delete.description: You are about to delete the project. After deleting the project you will not be able to access it again.
delete.confirmCode: Confirm project delete by typing <confirmCode>{{confirmCode}}</confirmCode> below.

leave.title: Leave Project Team
leave.description: You are about the leave the project team. After leaving the team you will not be able to access it again. Are you sure you would like to leave the team?

delete_env.title: Delete Environment
delete_env.alert_title: Are you sure to delete this environment?
delete_env.confirm_description: Confirm environment delete by typing <confirmCode>{{confirmCode}}</confirmCode> below.
